channel.title: Is Whonix intended for Hosting Onion Services?
channel.description:
Let's be explicit here. Is Whonix intended for torified browsing, or for hosting onion services, or both?
At first glance, I thought it was only intended for running client applications (tor browser, torified email), but there is also this page: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hidden_Services which discusses hosting an onion service.

item.title: Is Whonix intended for Hosting Onion Services?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Simply said, both.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Is Whonix intended for Hosting Onion Services?
